title: House for Sale in Battaramulla ( Gated community )
details:
* Luxury 4 bedroom house for sale in a gated community, 10 perches land, Living, Dining, pantry and a rough kitchen, 4 bed rooms, 3 bathrooms, TV area, beautiful garden, A/C, 2300 Sq, Roller gate, 24 hour security, Maids room and a bathroom.

* Price- 29 million, Selling for highest offer, inspection only through Appointment! Brokers will not be entertained!
